document_data.caption: A map showing the Shrouded Lands on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: the Shrouded Lands
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shrouded Lands''' was a stretch of land located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Shrouded Lands were wedged between [[the Highlands]] and [[Meirig Peatlands]] in western Gwynneth. This region of hills and plains stretched for nearly {{SI|50|mi|k|long=yes}} between the [[Toadstool Thicket]] in the coast of [[Corwell Firth]] to the southeast.
